result.purpose: Defines enumerations for various device-related types and provides utility functions for handling these enums.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating related enumerations and utility functions in separate files for maintainability and clarity.

internal/enums/deviceplatform.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for different device platforms and provides methods to retrieve their values.

internal/enums/devicestatus.go.purpose: Defines device status types and provides methods to retrieve their values.

internal/enums/enums.go.purpose: This file defines utility functions for converting between string representations and enum-like types.

internal/enums/pushnotification.go.purpose: Defines enums for push notification providers and recipients, along with utility methods to retrieve their string values.
